title: "Frank, I'd Like To Buy an "H" Please"
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: "Frank, I'd Like To Buy an "H" Please"
posts.post_content:
Nothing says Happy Holidays better than an "H" sale

Happy Smith Piedmont 350-460 BVG 3 $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10208/smith-h[/IMG]

Harry Lord Sweet Caporal 350 SGC 50 $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10267/lord[/IMG]

Hallman, Bill Sweet Caporal 350 BVG 3 $35

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10109/hallman[/IMG]

Hannifan, Jack Sovereign 350 (Forest) PSA 3 $50

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10436/hannafin-sov[/IMG]

and to top it off the 4 "H" special

Harry Howell Hand at Hip Polar Bear BVG 4 $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/11733/howell-hand-at-waist[/IMG]

All Prices  Net to Me with Free Shipping.

Frank,

I would like to be a member of 4H. That's if the Handsome Harry Howell Hand at Hip Polar Bear is still available?

Thanks

Jantz

[url]http://www.cbsnews.com/news/make-or-break-speeches/[/url]

Or "Hubert Horatio Hornblower," as Jimmy Carter famously (and accidentally) called the former veep?

I remember watching this Carter gaffe as a kid and laughing uncontrollably.

I will take this card if still for sale. Thanks Frank
JS
